results.name: Hexagonal polyominoes (or polyhexes, A000228) with perimeter 2n.
link: Picture from Andrew Clarke's page showing the polyhexes of perimeters 6, 8, ... 16.
xref: Cf. A000228, A000105, A057730, A258206 (counts only polyhexes without holes).
